title: Pro Evolution Soccer 2017 DEMO - READ INSTRUCTIONS
description:
Developer: KONAMI
Version: New demo + Teams Selector

Minimum System Requirements -
Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8 or Windows 10.
Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 1.8GHz / AMD Athlon ? X2 240.
RAM memory: 1,5 GB.
Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 / AMD / ATI Radeon X1600 / Intel HD Graphics 3000.
DirectX: Version 9.0c
Internet connection.
Free disk space: 7 GB.
Recommended system requirements -
Windows 8.1 or Windows 7 x-64.
Processor: Intel Core i3 530 / AMD Phenom ? X4 925
RAM memory: from 2 GB to 4 GB.
Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 / AMD / ATI Radeon HD4850 / Intel HD Graphics 4000.
DirectX: Version 9.0c
Internet connection.
Free Disk Space: 8 GB.

INSTALLATION :

NOTE ! : Disable your antivirus before install to prevent file deleting.

1. Mount or burn
2. Install
3. Create account on Steam if you did not have previously.
4. Start icon 'Steam for PES2017' and login.
5. Then press icon 'Demo Teams Selector', choose "Load PES2017.exe" and enter the path to exe,
and then select the teams you want to have your game.
6. Press 'SAVE' and close 'Demo Teams Selector'.
7. In Steam open your library and start "PES 2017 Demo".
8. Play!
(Available modes "Quick Match")
